mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents VALUES (#{cust_id}, #{cust_name}, #{cust_pwd}, #{phone}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{email}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET target_in = #{targetIn} + 1 WHERE id = #{voluId}
mapper.select:
SELECT c.id as voluId , c.topic_big as topicBig , c.topic_small as topicSmall , c.title , c.edate , c.ddate , c.target , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT a.cust_id), 0) as targetIn , IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT l.like_id), 0) as likesCount , c.image_main as imageMain , c.reword_coin as rewardCoin , c.view , c.rdate FROM contents c LEFT JOIN apply a ON c.id = a.contents_id LEFT JOIN likes l ON c.id = l.contents_id WHERE c.topic_big = 'V'
AND c.topic_small = #{topicSmall}
AND (c.edate >= #{currentDate} OR c.edate IS NULL)
GROUP BY c.id, c.topic_big, c.topic_small, c.title, c.edate, c.ddate, c.target, c.image_main, c.reword_coin, c.view, c.rdate
ORDER BY voluId DESC
ORDER BY likesCount DESC
ORDER BY c.edate ASC
ORDER BY targetIn DESC
ORDER BY c.view DESC
LIMIT 9
OFFSET #{offset}
